sentences.english: Explosion hazardous area 2 usually adopts safety-increased explosion-proof fluorescent lamp.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸危險2區內一般使用增安型防爆熒光燈照明。

sentences.english: Compact florescent light bulbs, on the other hand, are a somewhat different story.
sentences.chinese: 相反，緊湊型熒光燈泡有些不同。

sentences.english: There was more hoopla surrounding the introduction of incandescent lights than there seems to be surrounding compact fluorescents.
sentences.chinese: 當時，引進白熾燈可比引進緊湊熒光燈熱鬧許多。

sentences.english: This article reviewed the progress of solid state sources catch up with florescent lamps.
sentences.chinese: 綜述近三年來固態光源追趕熒光燈的進展。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a double filament fluorescent lamp and a lamp base.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型是一種雙燈絲熒光燈管及管座。

sentences.english: Most florescent bulbs cannot be dimmed.
sentences.chinese: 大多數熒光燈不能變灰。

sentences.english: They used fluorescent lights, so they had that distinct metallic, oldish smell places that use fluorescents always have.
sentences.chinese: 使用熒光燈的地方總是充斥着老舊的氣息。

sentences.english: Those bulbs also contain tiny amounts of mercury.
sentences.chinese: 這種熒光燈還含有一定量的水銀。

sentences.english: Fluorescent starter holder series have got CE approval.
sentences.chinese: 熒光燈啓輝器座產品系列已獲得CE認證。

sentences.english: First , power off , then , take away the fluorescent tubes .
sentences.chinese: 首先關掉電源把熒光燈管取下。

sentences.english: Federal officials say switching to compact florescent bulbs could significantly reduce energy demands every year.
sentences.chinese: 聯邦官員稱使用熒光燈每年可以明顯減少電能需求。

sentences.english: With cement floors and exposed florescent lighting, some offices have an industrial feel.
sentences.chinese: 水泥地面，熒光燈照明，讓辦公室看上去很有工業感。

sentences.english: Specify a custom height for the modular fluorescent fitting.
sentences.chinese: 指定板塊式熒光燈的自定義高度。

sentences.english: Replace incandescent bulbs with compact fluorescent lights.
sentences.chinese: 用結實的熒光燈代替白熾燈泡。

sentences.english: Plasma: Plasmas use the same technology that the Fluorescent lights over your head use to light televisions.
sentences.chinese: 等離子使用了類似你頭上熒光燈的技術來點亮屏幕。
